pros: There have been a lot of needed changes going on. A whole new administrative team within the last year. The hospital is revamping basically everything to bring everything up to date. I am optimistic that the future of this hospital will be amazing. The administration is focused on training, and creating a positive environment for both employees and patients. Administration is super involved. There is nothing that they will not do if needed, down to the most mundane jobs. This shows great leadership!
cons: The growing pains while they are updating, but they are expected to level out.

pros: Organization is the priority document and archiving. Can learn a lot about the conditions of patients
cons: The salary is bad for the employer
